title: Food Ordering Websites - MERN Stack
description: This is Project Build using MERN Stack. It Includes Order Food, Choose Menu, Login/Sign up and Admin Panel to maintain Food items. Then all the Food items are Stored in Database(MongoDb).

title: Book Store - MERN Stack
description: It is build using MERN stack. Basically it performs Add Book, Delete Book, Edit Book and Get Book details. It fetches all the information from the server The Book Items are stored in MongoDB Database.

title: Crypto Currency Websites - React
description: This is a project, it Fetches data from the API to display the Top 10 Crypto Currency(Bitcoins). The It display the Details of it and Includes the Graph of the Crypto Currency based on it Profit the past Months.

title: To Do List - React
description: This Project is useful to store the list of action that we have to Do. This for remembering our list work

title: Weather Report - React
description: In this project, It fetches the weather report from the API and Present it in a user Appealing Interface.It has a search bar You can search for your City and It will Display the weather report on that Particular City.

title: Drag and Drop Notes - React
description: It is just a note Taking Application on that you can drag your notes wherever you like on the screen. You can drop them on the screen it will be take the position where you drop it.

title: BMI Calculator - React
description: This project is for calculating the Body Mass Index of the Human Based on the Weight and Height of the the Person Which we have to give as an Input.

title: Currency Convertor - React
description: This Project is to Convert the Currency of different countries to the exact Value to the another country currency. For example, 1 USD = 84 INR (approximately).

title: Turtle Race (Game) - Python
description: This Project is like a game. The Turtle are arranged in a order then the game is begin and the Winner is decided by who finishes first.

title: Password Manager - Python
description: This Project is to store Your Password in a text file. The password will be encrypted and then stored on the text file, if you want the password it will decrypt it and display the password.

title: Slot Machine (Game) - Python
description: It is like a mini slot machine. In this you have to bet on the lines of the slot machine. If the Lines matches the all the slots in the slot machine, You won and you bet is increased based on the symbols in the slot. Otherwise, you lose the bet.

title: Typing Test - Python
description: This Project is for text your Typing skills. It displays the correct words in green and Wrong words in red. Also display the WPM.

title: Travel App - Mobile Application
description: This Project is to store Your Password in a text file. The password will be encrypted and then stored on the text file, if you want the password it will decrypt it and display the password.
